display.last-info: Click on a geometry to view its information
display.group-info: Select multiple geometries to view demand statistics
display.title: Information

download.info:
Upon downloading, you'll receive two files:
  • selection.csv: Contains a list with the selected geometries and their respective energy demands
  • statistics.csv: Has the data shown in the group information table

recalculate.tooltip:
The tool recalculates the demand after increasing wall or ceiling insulation, or changing windows.
In the first two cases, you can select the thickness of the insulation you want to add to the existing enclosure, considering a standard insulation with thermal conductivity Î»=0.04 W/m K.
Regarding window replacement, three options are available:
  • double glazing, considered as 4/10/4 glass (U=2.9 W/m2K) 4/10/4 (U=2,9 W/m2K)
  • ouble glazing with 90% Argon gas 6/6/6 (U=2.0 W/m2K)
  • Double glazing with 90% Argon gas 6/15/6 (U=1.0 W/m2K)
recalculate.title: Recalculate demand
recalculate.min-error: The value must be at least 0
recalculate.warning-detailed: Detailed mode may take up to 5 minutes to calculate

tipv.label: Window change
tipv.no_change: The windows are not being changed
tipv.doble_argon: Double glass with argon chamber (U=2.0 W/m2K)
tipv.doble_argon+: Double glass with argon chamber + (U=1.0 W/m2K)
